name: Mecha Punk!
description:
Its a fighting game with controls send via signal.? yes via signal. every player has a transmitter that send the commands to your robot. The farther your robot is the farther the signal travel to be received by your robot. So think ahead of your strategy and may the best player wins.

Created by:

John Michael Tawaging - Programmer

Carmelli Mareeze Pandan - Artist
